messages.content: I am seeking information regarding the following: River Phoenix died during the making of which movie. Kindly provide a well-reasoned and accurate response.

response:
River Phoenix died during the making of the film **"Dark Blood."**

**Reasoned explanation:**
River Phoenix, a talented American actor, tragically died on October 31, 1993, at the age of 23. At the time of his death, he was in the middle of filming "Dark Blood," a drama directed by George Sluizer. The production was not completed due to his untimely passing. Years later, in 2012, the director finished the film using existing footage and narration to fill in the missing scenes.

Phoenix was not actively filming any other movie at the time of his death, making "Dark Blood" the project he left unfinished.
